comments.body: It seems that it's a bit weird to name the scala file package.scala.

I think in Scala it is convention to name the file that contains package objects `package.scala`. E.g. `/path/to/package/package.scala`. Here are some examples:

1. Documentation: https://docs.scala-lang.org/tour/package-objects.html
2. Scala Library: https://github.com/scala/scala/blob/2.13.x/src/library/scala/collection/package.scala
